Somone Has Your Password

by James Stewart
  •  Web Mentions Published:  03 March 2017 @ 19:38:53 WTZ
Updated:  04 March 2017 @ 13:02:37 WTZ
Location:  Tim Hortons, 1003 Kingsway, Sudbury, Ontario, P3B 2E6, Canada

 

So, I received a few e-mails this evening from Google…  Seemingly, somebody in Sarnia has (or, had, rather) the password to my primary Google account.

Pictured above, is just one of the alerts that I’d received.  There were actually numerous failed attempts to gain access to my account.  All of them were from the same IP address.

If the would-be intruder were, in fact from Sarnia, I only know one person in that area…  At least, that I’m aware of anyhow.  That person would be my ex-wife, Debra.  And, to be brutally honest, I wasn’t with her for her brains…  She’s a stereotypical blonde woman.

Regardless of who it actually was, they failed miserably.  Nobody has ever, to-date, successfully infiltrated any of my accounts…  And, that’s not for a lack of trying either.
